pages.text: You've finally managed to mix colors properly. What could be more natural than to try out the properties of your new $(l:general/pigment)Pigments$() right away? You've had enough of the normal $(item)Redstone Lamps$() by now. Time to add a splash of color!$()

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: They are surrounded by a vibrant light when activated. Besides that, Colored Lamps function similar to their boring Redstone counterpart.
